welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Market Harborough, a charming town known for its quaint streets and historic charm. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the terminal building and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights. It offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
